A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lots of spoilers ahead don't read if u haven't seen the film. I didn't dislike this movie. The arching theme - the first order taking out the last bit of the resistance - was ok. However\, it was kinda ineptly written in a lot of ways. The luke/Rey drama was fine. Best part of the movie. The whole scenario where the fleet is outrunning the empire was dumb that's not how space and physics work\, Not to mention the first order star destroyers are insanely powerful and fast but they just sat there during both battles. The resistance could have just jumped twice very fast to lose the tail (before the fleet caught them to scan them). Look I get that it's just a movie but it felt lazy they could have come up with something better than this perfect scenario where poor Jurassic Park lady kills herself bc their ships are out of gas... out of gas? WHAT???? WTF capital ships in star wars all go years without needing fuel but all run out at the same time..... after being in orbit of a resupply base. How dumb are these ppl? Not to mention that hyperspace is another dimension so the cruiser would have gone through that fleet. or just smashed against shields (there are scenarios where an executer class have had multiple ships of that size do exactly this to them and the shields didn't fall). Snokes ship is about thirty times the size of an executer... That Mon cal cruiser would have gone 'pink'. do love dark solo though his casual force throws are very funny. Disney\, you need to have a vast array of script writers\, maybe some that have tactical experience... the ppl writing the feels don't know shit about fleet mechanics\, obviously.
